mapper.select: SELECT id, ip, count, bot, version, page_name as pageName, tstamp as created FROM nstatistics_bots WHERE IP = #{IP} AND ( DATE_FORMAT( tstamp, '%m-%d-%Y %H:%i:%s') = DATE_FORMAT( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '%m-%d-%Y %H:%i:%s') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nstatistics_bots (id, ip, count, bot, version, page_name, tstamp) VALUES (#{id}, #{IP}, #{count}, #{bot}, #{version}, #{pageName}, #{created})
